Najslabši igralec purgerjev
Drevi trije Slovenci v ognju nogometne lige prvakov. Dinamov Petar Stojanović tarča novinarskih kritik.
06 Nov 2019, 08:57 by Marko Uršič
LJUBLJANA – Trije slovenski nogometaši bodo igrali v drevišnjih tekmah 4. kroga lige prvakov. V skupini C dva, Petar Stojanović z Dinamom pričakuje ukrajinski Šahtar, Josip Iličić z Atalanto pa v Milanu gosti Manchester City. V skupini D bo madridski Atletico, skupaj z Juventusom vodi s sedmimi točkami, z Janom Oblakom v vratih gostoval pri Bayerju iz Leverkusna. Za zagrebški Dinamo bo obračun na stadionu Maksimir pomemben v boju za osmino finala, razmišlja se le o zmagi in treh točkah. Vrstni red v skupini C je namreč: Manchester City 9, Dinamo in Šahtar 4, Atalanta brez točke, v osmino finala pa napredujeta prvo- in drugouvrščeni klub.So se pa hrvaški novinarski specialisti razpisali o slovenskem reprezentantu Stojanoviću, namreč da trener Nenad Bjelica ščiti svojega najslabšega igralca in s tem skriva največjo Dinamovo težavo. Nogometni purgerji so postali resno evropsko moštvo, taktično prilagodljivo na vsakega tekmeca, a Bjelica ni rešil največje kadrovske težave, desni branilec Petar Stojanović je namreč šibka točka zagrebških modrih.Slovenski reprezentant je eden najslabših branilcev v ligi prvakov, v vseh statičnih prvinah je pod povprečjem, kakovosten je le pri odvzemu žoge, za kar se lahko deloma zahvali Bjeličevi taktični različici (5-3-2, srednji branilci zaradi igralca več v zadnji vrsti v njem lažje pokrijejo tudi bočna položaja). S tem ima Ljubljančan večjo svobodo za prehode v napad, v katerem lahko ponudi več kot v obrambi. 
Prepočasi razmišlja
A nasprotniki načrtujejo napade ravno prek Stojanovića. Soigralci mu sicer pomagajo, zato je slovenski nogometaš v igri videti bolje, kot je res, a njegove defenzivne pomanjkljivosti so očitne. Je izrazito motoričen igralec, to je njegova edina kakovostna plat na ravni pravega evropskega branilca. Kombinacija prizadevnosti, hitrosti in moči bi teoretično morala biti idealna za branilca za dvoboj igro v sestavi Nenada Bjelice.Dinamov desni branilec tudi ne zna prepoznati položaja na igrišču, četudi mu to uspe, je že prepozno, zato niti s hitrostjo ne more več popraviti napake. V ligi prvakov sta jeziček na tehtnici sposobnost hitrega dojemanja in ustrezno predvidevanje dogodkov. Petar Stojanović premalo in prepočasi razmišlja, spravlja se v položaje, v katerih so možnosti za uspešno posredovanje zelo majhne. Zato je Dinamova prvenstvena naloga v naslednjem prestopnem roku najti ustreznega desnega branilca.

Worst purger player
The trees of three Slovenes are on fire at the Champions League. Dinamo's Petar Stojanovic is the target of journalistic criticism.
06 Nov 2019, 08:57 by Marko Ursic
LJUBLJANA - Three Slovenian footballers will play in the ancient games of the 4th round of the Champions League. In Group C two, Petar Stojanovic with Dinamo expects Ukrainian Shakhtar, while Josip Ilicic with Atalanta hosts Manchester City in Milan. In Group D, Madrid's Atletico, together with Juventus lead by seven points, with Jan Cloud in the door will host Bayer from Leverkusen. For Dinamo Zagreb, the showdown at Maksimir Stadium will be important in the fight for the eighth finals, only a victory and three points are considered. The order in Group C is: Manchester City 9, Dinamo and Shakhtar 4, Atalanta without a point, and in the eighth finals they advance to the first and second ranked club. However, Croatian journalist specialists have announced about the Slovenian national team Stojanović, namely that coach Nenad Bjelica protects his worst player, thus hiding Dinamo's biggest problem. Football purgers have become a serious European team, tactically adaptable to every competitor, but Bjelica has not solved the biggest personnel problem, right-back Petar Stojanovic is the weak point of Zagreb's wisdom. , he is only good at taking the ball away, for which Bjelic's tactical version can be partly due (5-3-2, middle defenders make it easier to cover lateral positions because of the player in the back row). Thereby, the citizen of Ljubljana has more freedom to move to attack, in which he can offer more than in defense.
Too slow to think
But opponents are planning attacks through Stojanovic. His teammates are helping him, so the Slovenian footballer looks better than he really is, but his defensive weaknesses are obvious. He is a highly motorized player, his only quality side at the level of a true European defender. The combination of diligence, speed and power should theoretically be ideal for a Nenad Bjelica defender to play duel. Dynamo's right-back also fails to recognize his position on the pitch, even if he succeeds, it's too late, so he can't correct the mistake with speed . In the Champions League, the tab on the scale is the ability to quickly perceive and anticipate events accordingly. Petar Stojanovic thinks too little and too slowly, and finds himself in situations where the chances of successful intervention are very small. Therefore, Dinamo's primary task is to find the right right-back in the next transfer deadline.
